Head: 머리
QG_ReportThis: If you see this in-game, please report where you see this.
QG_WeaponMasteryDescription: Show off your prowess with specific weapons.
QG_WeaponMasteryAccept: So you're up for the challenge? Let's see how you do!
QG_WeaponMasterySuccess: You did it. You crazy son of a bitch, You did it!
QG_FetchDescription: Finally put that hoard of useless stuff to use.
QG_FetchAccept: You probably have all the stuff lying around already.
QG_FetchSuccess: I hope that wasn't too difficult. Here's some new stuff for you to hoard instead.
QG_PostmanDescription: Delivery? Delivery! Stuff needs delivering, and you're the only one I trust. Good luck out there gordon.
QG_PostmanAccept: Yes, you have to find the stuff first. That was in the contract. Maybe you should've read it, no?
QG_PostmanSuccess: Here's a reward for your hard work. There is always more stuff that need delivered, should you need more work.
QG_RunnerDescription: Things change quickly in Tarkov, I need you to check some places out for me. Ensure things are as they should be.
QG_RunnerAccept: Strap on those running shoes, down that energy drink. It's time to run!
QG_RunnerSuccess: Here, have some water. Good job. I take it the places were as they should? Good.
QG_SniperDescription: I need these guys gone. And without any evidence of who did it. Think you can handle that? Excellent.
QG_SniperAccept: Since you're a pro, Im not providing you any gear. But the rewards will be immense.
QG_SniperSuccess: Wow! I have reports from the area that Death came and visited. I'm impressed. I bet they didn't even see it coming.
